Package eg.syntax

Class SyntaxUtils

java.lang.Object
eg.syntax.SyntaxUtils
public class SyntaxUtils
extends java.lang.Object
Static variables and methods to search for text elements

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int BLOCK_QUOTED
    Option for searching quoted text elements in which the quotation may be multiline
    static int IGNORE_QUOTED
    Option for no effect if a text element is in quotes
    static int LINE_QUOTED
    Option for searching quoted text elements in which the quotation must be found within line

  • Field Details

    • IGNORE_QUOTED

      public static int IGNORE_QUOTED
      Option for no effect if a text element is in quotes

    • BLOCK_QUOTED

      public static int BLOCK_QUOTED
      Option for searching quoted text elements in which the quotation may be multiline

    • LINE_QUOTED

      public static int LINE_QUOTED
      Option for searching quoted text elements in which the quotation must be found within line

  • Method Details

    • isWord

      public static boolean isWord​(java.lang.String text, int pos, int length, char[] nonWordStart)
      Returns if a section with the specified length is a word
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position where the section starts
      length - the length of the section
      nonWordStart - the array of characters that must not precede a word, in addition to letters and digits. Can be null
      Returns:
      true if a word is found

    • isWordStart

      public static boolean isWordStart​(java.lang.String text, int pos, char[] nonWordStart)
      Returns if the specified position is a word start
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position
      nonWordStart - the array of characters that must not precede a word, in addition to letters and digits. Can be null
      Returns:
      true if word start is found, false otherwise

    • isWordEnd

      public static boolean isWordEnd​(java.lang.String text, int pos)
      Returns if the specified position is a word end
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position
      Returns:
      true if a word end is found, false otherwise

    • sectionLength

      public static int sectionLength​(java.lang.String text, int pos, char[] endMarks, char[] successors)
      Returns the length of a section that starts at the specified position and ends before one of the characters in endMarks
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position
      endMarks - the characters that mark the end of the section
      successors - the characters that disable endMarks if they directly follow pos
      Returns:
      the length of the section

    • sectionLength

      public static int sectionLength​(java.lang.String text, int pos, java.lang.String[] keywords)
      Returns the length of a section that corresponds to the length of one of the strings in keywords if it is contained in the text at the specified position
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position
      keywords - the keywords
      Returns:
      the length of the section; 0 if a keyword is not found

    • isCharEqualTo

      public static boolean isCharEqualTo​(java.lang.String text, char[] targets, int pos)
      Returns if the character at the specified position is equal to one of the characters in targets
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      targets - the target characters
      pos - the position
      Returns:
      true if equal

    • isInBlock

      public static boolean isInBlock​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String blockStart, java.lang.String blockEnd, int pos, int quoteOpt)
      Returns if the specified position is found inside a block
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      blockStart - the start of a block
      blockEnd - the end of a block
      pos - the position
      quoteOpt - the option to define if or how matches in quotes are skipped: one of IGNORE_QUOTED, BLOCK_QUOTED and LINE_QUOTED
      Returns:
      true if inside a block, false otherwise

    • lastBlockStart

      public static int lastBlockStart​(java.lang.String text, int pos, java.lang.String blockStart, java.lang.String blockEnd, int quoteOpt)
      Returns the position of the last block start
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position where the search starts
      blockStart - the start of a block
      blockEnd - the end of a block
      quoteOpt - the option to define if or how matches in quotes are skipped: one of IGNORE_QUOTED, BLOCK_QUOTED and LINE_QUOTED
      Returns:
      the position of the last block start. -1 if a block end is closer than a block start or if no block start is found

    • nextBlockStart

      public static int nextBlockStart​(java.lang.String text, int pos, java.lang.String blockStart, java.lang.String blockEnd, int quoteOpt)
      Returns the position of the next block start
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position where the search starts
      blockStart - the start of a block
      blockEnd - the end of a block
      quoteOpt - the option to define if or how matches in quotes are skipped: one of IGNORE_QUOTED, BLOCK_QUOTED and LINE_QUOTED
      Returns:
      the position of the next block start. -1 if a block end is closer than a block start or if no block start is found

    • nextBlockEnd

      public static int nextBlockEnd​(java.lang.String text, int pos, java.lang.String blockStart, java.lang.String blockEnd, int quoteOpt)
      Returns the position of the next block end
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position where the search starts
      blockStart - the start of a block
      blockEnd - the end of a block
      quoteOpt - the option to define if or how matches in quotes are skipped: one of IGNORE_QUOTED, BLOCK_QUOTED and LINE_QUOTED
      Returns:
      the position of the next block end. -1 if a block start is closer than a block end or if no block end is found

    • nextUnquoted

      public static int nextUnquoted​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String toSearch, int pos)
      Returns the position of the next toSearch that is not quoted
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      toSearch - the string that is searched
      pos - the position where the search starts
      Returns:
      the position of toSearch, -1 if not found

    • lastUnquoted

      public static int lastUnquoted​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String toSearch, int pos)
      Returns the position of the last toSearch that is not quoted
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      toSearch - the string that is searched
      pos - the position where the search starts
      Returns:
      the position of toSearch, -1 if not found

    • isQuoted

      public static boolean isQuoted​(java.lang.String text, int pos, int quoteOpt)
      Returns if the specified position is found in a section that is quoted with single or double quote marks
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position
      quoteOpt - the option for quotations: one of BLOCK_QUOTED and LINE_QUOTED
      Returns:
      true if quoted, false otherwise

    • isQuoted

      public static boolean isQuoted​(java.lang.String text, int pos)
      Returns if the specified position is found in a section that is quoted with single or double quote marks
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position
      Returns:
      true if quoted

    • isQuoted

      public static boolean isQuoted​(java.lang.String text, int pos, char quoteMark)
      Returns if the specified position is found in a quoted section
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position
      quoteMark - the quoteMark
      Returns:
      true if quoted

    • nextNonEscaped

      public static int nextNonEscaped​(java.lang.String text, char toSearch, int pos)
      Returns the next position of toSearch that is not preceded by a backslash that is itself not preceded by a backslash.
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      toSearch - the char that is searched
      pos - the position where the search starts
      Returns:
      the position

    • nextNonSpace

      public static int nextNonSpace​(java.lang.String text, int pos)
      Returns the position of the next non space character
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      pos - the position where the search starts
      Returns:
      the position of the next space or the text length if none is found

    • isInTextBlock

      public static boolean isInTextBlock​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String del, int pos, java.lang.String lineCmntStart)
      Returns if the specified position is found inside a text block
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      del - the delimiter that surrounds the text block
      pos - the position
      lineCmntStart - the mark for line comment. The delimiter is skipped if found in a commented line. Null to ignore line comments
      Returns:
      true if inside a text block, false otherwise

    • isLineCommented

      public static boolean isLineCommented​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String lineCmntStart, int pos, int quoteOpt)
      Returns if an (unquoted) line comment start is found before the the specified position
      Parameters:
      text - the text
      lineCmntStart - the string that starts a line comment
      pos - the position
      quoteOpt - one of IGNORE_QUOTED, BLOCK_QUOTED and LINE_QUOTED
      Returns:
      true if in a line comment, false otherwise
